mapper.sql: id, subjectType, subjectCode, resourceType, resourceCode, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE cm_auth_acl
subjectType = #{map.subjectType},
subjectCode = #{map.subjectCode},
resourceType = #{map.resourceType},
resourceCode = #{map.resourceCode},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cm_auth_acl
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND subjectType like CONCAT('%', #{subjectType} , '%')
AND subjectCode like CONCAT('%', #{subjectCode} , '%')
AND resourceType like CONCAT('%', #{resourceType} , '%')
AND resourceCode like CONCAT('%', #{resourceCode} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
